categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Vodd was a female Pureblood Sith Lord of the Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. At some point she became part of the Order of Revan and defected the Empire, joining with the Revanite forces on Rishi. During the Battle of Rishi in 3637 BBY she and a fellow Revanite Obai tried to stop a strike team from reaching the signal jammer on the Razorback Island, but failed and were killed.
Lord Vodd appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
